code: import{load,remove}from'react-cookies';import{getCookieOptions}from'./domain';var profileKey='profile';export var getProfile=function getProfile(){try{var profile=load(profileKey);return JSON.parse(atob(profile));}catch(e){return{};}};export var getProfileByKey=function getProfileByKey(key){var profile=getProfile();return profile[key];};export var clearProfile=function clearProfile(){return remove(profileKey,getCookieOptions());};
